description: Integrate SoundCloud user, track and playlist information.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Provides access tokens once a user has authorized your application.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: The client secret belonging to your application

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: The redirect uri you have configured for your application

args.name: code
args.info: The authorization code obtained when user is sent to redirectUri.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: The client secret belonging to your application

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: The redirect uri you have configured for your application

args.name: refreshToken
args.info: Refresh token received when you received your access token.

blocks.name: getMe
blocks.description: Gets information about the authenticated user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getUserTracks
blocks.description: Gets information about tracks of the user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getUserPlaylists
blocks.description: Gets information about playlists of the user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getUserFollowings
blocks.description: Gets list of users who are followed by the user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: followingId
args.info: ID of the user to follow.

args.name: followingId
args.info: ID of the user to stop following.

blocks.name: getUserFollowers
blocks.description: Gets list of users who are following the user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getUserComments
blocks.description: Gets list of comments from this user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getTracksLikedByUser
blocks.description: Gets list of comments from this user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: trackId
args.info: ID of the track to favorite.

args.name: trackId
args.info: ID of the track to favorite.

blocks.name: checkUserLikedTrack
blocks.description: Gets info about single track liked by user.

args.name: trackId
args.info: ID of the track to check.

args.name: userId
args.info: ID of the user to check.

blocks.name: checkMeLikedTrack
blocks.description: Gets info about single track liked by current user.

args.name: trackId
args.info: ID of the track to check.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getMyConnections
blocks.description: Gets list of connections for the current user.

blocks.name: getMyTracks
blocks.description: Gets list of tracks for the current user.

blocks.name: getMyPlaylists
blocks.description: Gets list of playlists for the current user.

blocks.name: getMyFollowings
blocks.description: Gets list of users who are followed by the current user.

blocks.name: getMyFollowers
blocks.description: Gets list of users who are following the current user

blocks.name: getMyComments
blocks.description: Gets list of comments of the current user

blocks.name: getTracksLikedByMe
blocks.description: Gets list of tracks favorited by the current user

blocks.name: getMyWebProfiles
blocks.description: Gets list of web profiles of the current user

blocks.name: getMyActivities
blocks.description: Gets list of acitivites for the current user.

blocks.name: getMyFollowedUsersRecentTracks
blocks.description: Gets recent tracks from users the logged-in user follows.

blocks.name: getMyRecentTracksActivities
blocks.description: Gets recent activities on the logged-in users tracks.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: searchString
args.info: A string to search for. When this parameter is used, only compact representations are returned.

args.name: representation
args.info: compact (no track listing) or id (track listing only contains track IDs).

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getOembed
blocks.description: The SoundCloud oEmbed endpoint will serve the widget embed code for any SoundCloud URL pointing to a user, set, or a playlist.

args.name: link
args.info: A Soundcloud URL for a track, set, user.

args.name: maxHeight
args.info: The maximum height in px. The default is 166px for tracks and 450px for sets. If using the flash widget, the default is 81px for tracks and 305px for sets.

args.name: color
args.info: The primary color of the widget as a hex triplet. (For example: ff0066).

args.name: autoPlay
args.info: Whether the widget plays on load. Format: true OR false(default).

args.name: showComments
args.info: Whether the player displays timed comments. Format: true(default) OR false.

args.name: iframe
args.info: Whether the new HTML5 Iframe-based Widget or the old Adobe Flash Widget will be returned. Format: true(default) OR false.

blocks.name: resolveResourcesFromURL
blocks.description: The resolve resource allows you to lookup and access API resources when you only know the SoundCloud.com URL.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: createMyConnection
blocks.description: Create connection representing the external profile (like twitter, tumblr or facebook profiles and pages)

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: Link to the page user has to be redirected.

args.name: service
args.info: The type of the described connection. Possible values: facebook_profile, twitter, myspace.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: tags
args.info: A comma separated list of tags.

args.name: license
args.info: Creative common license. Possible values: no-rights-reserved, all-rights-reserved, cc-by, cc-by-nc, cc-by-nd, cc-by-sa, cc-by-nc-nd, cc-by-nc-sa.

args.name: bpmFrom
args.info: Return tracks with at least this bpm value.

args.name: bpmTo
args.info: Return tracks with at most this bpm value.

args.name: durationFrom
args.info: Return tracks with at least this duration (in millis).

args.name: durationTo
args.info: Return tracks with at most this duration (in millis).

args.name: createdAtFrom
args.info: (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) return tracks created at this date or later.

args.name: createdAtTo
args.info: (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) return tracks created at this date or earlier.

args.name: ids
args.info: A comma separated list of track ids to filter on.

args.name: genres
args.info: A comma separated list of genres.

args.name: types
args.info: A comma separated list of types.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client id belonging to your application.

blocks.name: getUsersLikedTrack
blocks.description: Gets users who liked this track.

blocks.name: getTrackSecretToken
blocks.description: Gets secret token of the track.

blocks.name: updateTrackSecretToken
blocks.description: Updates secret token of the track.

blocks.name: checkUserFollowing
blocks.description: Check if user if following other user.

args.name: followingId
args.info: ID of the user who may be followed.

blocks.name: checkMeFollowing
blocks.description: Check if user if following other user.

args.name: followingId
args.info: ID of the user who may be followed.

args.name: playlistSharing
args.info: Sharing type of the playlist. Possible values: public OR private.

args.name: tracks
args.info: Array of tracks IDs to add to the playlist.

args.name: embeddableBy
args.info: Who can embed this playlist. Possible value: all OR me OR none.

args.name: tagList
args.info: Contains a list of tags separated by spaces. Multiword tags are quoted in doublequotes.

args.name: playlistType
args.info: Playlist type. Possible values: ep single, album, compilation, project files, archive, showcase, demo, sample pack, other

args.name: tracks
args.info: Array of tracks IDs to add to the playlist.

args.name: playlistSharing
args.info: Sharing type of the playlist. Possible values: public OR private.

args.name: embeddableBy
args.info: Who can embed this playlist. Possible value: all OR me OR none.

args.name: tagList
args.info: Contains a list of tags separated by spaces. Multiword tags are quoted in doublequotes.

args.name: playlistType
args.info: Playlist type. Possible values: ep single, album, compilation, project files, archive, showcase, demo, sample pack, other

args.name: trackSharing
args.info: Type of sharing. Possible value: public OR private.

args.name: videoUrl
args.info: A link to a video page.

args.name: embeddableBy
args.info: Who can embed this track. Possible value: all OR me OR none.

args.name: tagList
args.info: Contains a list of tags separated by spaces. Multiword tags are quoted in doublequotes.

args.name: trackType
args.info: Track type. Possible values: original, remix, live, recording, spoken, podcast, demo, in progress, stem, loop, sound effect, sample, other

args.name: license
args.info: Creative common license. Possible values: no-rights-reserved, all-rights-reserved, cc-by, cc-by-nc, cc-by-nd, cc-by-sa, cc-by-nc-nd, cc-by-nc-sa

args.name: trackSharing
args.info: Type of sharing. Possible value: public OR private.

args.name: embeddableBy
args.info: Who can embed this track or playlist. Possible value: all OR me OR none.

args.name: tagList
args.info: Contains a list of tags separated by spaces. Multiword tags are quoted in doublequotes.

args.name: trackType
args.info: Track type. Possible values: original, remix, live, recording, spoken, podcast, demo, in progress, stem, loop, sound effect, sample, other

args.name: license
args.info: Creative common license. Possible values: no-rights-reserved, all-rights-reserved, cc-by, cc-by-nc, cc-by-nd, cc-by-sa, cc-by-nc-nd, cc-by-nc-sa

args.name: websiteTitle
args.info: A custom title for the website.
